https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/h0qfI4ol4kzD2B5CEpYbQNtJqPR.jpg Not having bitten anyone at the age of 25 makes the young vampire Victor feel quite inadequate. New hope blooms, however, when he meets Sophia, a young doctor. Bats in the Belly
